p: Anti-arthritic and anti-inflammatory effects of the plant were studied in adjuvant arthritic rats at a concentration of 1000 mg/kg and results were compared with indomethacin. The promising anti-arthritic potential was examined by stabilizing lysosomal enzyme activity ( 143). Administration of root powder at a dose of 600 mg/kg of body weight to collagen-induced arthritic rats considerably suppressed the severity of arthritis with improvement in functional recovery of motor activity and radiological score ( 145).
